description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0, and also fix the add function which was incorrectly multiplying instead of adding. These are critical bugs that would cause runtime errors (ZeroDivisionError) and incorrect calculations. - Fix the add function to perform addition instead of multiplication

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0, and also fix the add function which was incorrectly multiplying instead of adding. These are critical bugs that would cause runtime errors (ZeroDivisionError) and incorrect calculations.
